snippet: Mitt Romney did not relent on his criticism of Jon M. Huntsman Jr. for serving as ambassador to China in the Obama administration.
abstract: Mitt Romney did not relent on his criticism of Jon M. Huntsman Jr. for serving as ambassador to China in the Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. had something he wanted to get off his chest -- 10 hours after last night's debate.
